instruction: Create a new case file named Training Simple Case

instruction: Add a case file item called SimpleRootItem with a property called FirstProperty
source: <definitions xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/CMMN/20151109/MODEL" xmlns:cafienne="org.cafienne"><caseFileItemDefinition name="SimpleRootItem" definitionType="http://www.omg.org/spec/CMMN/DefinitionType/Unspecified" id="training_simple_case_type_SimpleRootItem.object"><property name="FirstProperty" type="http://www.omg.org/spec/CMMN/PropertyType/string"/></caseFileItemDefinition><caseFileItemDefinition name="training_simple_case" definitionType="http://www.omg.org/spec/CMMN/DefinitionType/Unspecified" id="training_simple_case.type"/><case id="training_simple_case.case" name="training_simple_case" expressionLanguage="spel"><caseFileModel cafienne:typeRef="training_simple_case.type"><caseFileItem id="SimpleRootItem" name="SimpleRootItem" multiplicity="ExactlyOne" definitionRef="training_simple_case_type_SimpleRootItem.object"/></caseFileModel><casePlanModel id="cm__65qFi_0" name="training_simple_case" autoComplete="true"/><caseRoles cafienne:caseTeamRef="training_simple_case.caseteam"/></case><CMMNDI><CMMNDiagram><CMMNShape name="training_simple_case" cmmnElementRef="cm__65qFi_0"><Bounds x="20" y="20" width="800" height="500"/></CMMNShape></CMMNDiagram></CMMNDI></definitions>

instruction: Trigger a milestone when the SimpleRootItem has been created
source: <definitions xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/CMMN/20151109/MODEL" xmlns:cafienne="org.cafienne"><caseFileItemDefinition name="SimpleRootItem" definitionType="http://www.omg.org/spec/CMMN/DefinitionType/Unspecified" id="training_simple_case_type_SimpleRootItem.object"><property name="FirstProperty" type="http://www.omg.org/spec/CMMN/PropertyType/string"/></caseFileItemDefinition><caseFileItemDefinition name="training_simple_case" definitionType="http://www.omg.org/spec/CMMN/DefinitionType/Unspecified" id="training_simple_case.type"/><case id="training_simple_case.case" name="training_simple_case" expressionLanguage="spel"><caseFileModel cafienne:typeRef="training_simple_case.type"><caseFileItem id="SimpleRootItem" name="SimpleRootItem" multiplicity="ExactlyOne" definitionRef="training_simple_case_type_SimpleRootItem.object"/></caseFileModel><casePlanModel id="cm__65qFi_0" name="training_simple_case" autoComplete="true"><planItem id="_65qFi_1" name="Simple Root data created" definitionRef="ms__65qFi_1"><entryCriterion id="crit__65qFi_0" sentryRef="s_crit__65qFi_0"/><itemControl id="_65qFi_2"><requiredRule id="_65qFi_3"><condition id="_65qFi_4"><body><![CDATA[true]]></body></condition></requiredRule></itemControl></planItem><sentry id="s_crit__65qFi_0"><caseFileItemOnPart id="_65qFi_5" sourceRef="SimpleRootItem"><standardEvent>create</standardEvent></caseFileItemOnPart></sentry><milestone id="ms__65qFi_1" name="Simple Root data created"/></casePlanModel><caseRoles cafienne:caseTeamRef="training_simple_case.caseteam"/></case><CMMNDI><CMMNDiagram><CMMNShape name="training_simple_case" cmmnElementRef="cm__65qFi_0"><Bounds x="20" y="20" width="800" height="500"/></CMMNShape><CMMNShape cmmnElementRef="SimpleRootItem"><Bounds x="240.44140625" y="236.80078125" width="25" height="40"/></CMMNShape><CMMNShape cmmnElementRef="_65qFi_1"><Bounds x="440" y="240" width="100" height="40"/></CMMNShape><CMMNShape cmmnElementRef="crit__65qFi_0"><Bounds x="434" y="250" width="12" height="20"/></CMMNShape><CMMNEdge sourceCMMNElementRef="SimpleRootItem" targetCMMNElementRef="crit__65qFi_0"/></CMMNDiagram></CMMNDI></definitions>
